recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika Multimedia, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem informasi, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak, Teknologi Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Product Owner (experienced):
•  Assist the HPIT team in developing and prioritizing the product backlog based on business needs and stakeholder input.
•  Help manage user stories and acceptance criteria, ensuring requirements are clear to the HPIT development team.
•  Support collaboration with the HPIT design and engineering teams to ensure features are developed in line with product objectives.
•  Assist in analyzing user feedback and providing initial recommendations for feature improvements planned by HPIT.
•  Support sprint activities such as sprint planning, reviews, and daily standups to help track progress according to the HPIT roadmap.
